lore: Ottum begin their lives as tiny parasites that burrow into the skulls of their prey and feast on the brain matter found within. After they've consumed enough food, they go into hiding for 6 years during which they grow into the unstoppable killing machines we've grown to know and love.
menagerieDialog: (This creature's demeanor is disconcerting. It barely moves aside from the occasional twitch of its body, and its eyes blink rapidly when you approach it.)
(Its blades are dripping with blood. Uh oh.)
(It's casually levitating off the ground while enjoying the company of your other creatures.)
(Its eyes are always so full of murderous intent. Relax!)
(It makes horrible smacking sounds with its mouth while it eats.)
name: Ottum
